Package uk.ac.ed.inf.aqmaps

Class Path

java.lang.Object
uk.ac.ed.inf.aqmaps.Path
public class Path
extends java.lang.Object
Encapsulates sequence of moves as both-ways linked list structure. Provides functionality to search for a path to a target point in 2D space.

  • Constructor Summary

    • getMoveDirections

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> getMoveDirections()
      Assumes this is reference to start of the this and lists all move directions used in it onwards.
      Returns:
      list of move directions that in this path

    • getPoints

      public java.util.ArrayList<com.mapbox.geojson.Point> getPoints()
      Assumes this is reference to start of the this and lists all points in it onwards.
      Returns:
      list of points that in this path

    • getStartPoint

      public com.mapbox.geojson.Point getStartPoint()
      Returns:
      the first point in this path

    • addMove

      public void addMove​(com.mapbox.geojson.Point end, int direction)
      Extends the end of this path by a new move. Does not keep track of length.
      Parameters:
      end - the new end point of the path
      direction - the direction that was used to get to this point

    • toFeature

      public com.mapbox.geojson.Feature toFeature()
      Returns:
      line string feature representing the current path from here onwards

    • findPathToPoint

      public static Path findPathToPoint​(com.mapbox.geojson.Point start, com.mapbox.geojson.Point target, double range, double moveLength, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> directions, java.util.ArrayList<com.mapbox.geojson.Polygon> obstacles)
      Performs an variation of A* search.
      Parameters:
      start - the start point of the path
      target - target the point that the path should lead to
      range - the range around the target within which the path should end
      moveLength - the length of each move in the path
      directions - the list of allowed directions for the moves in degrees
      obstacles - the list of polygons that should not be crossed
      Returns:
      path to the target point within range while avoiding obstacles
